page.title: 14A.SANDERS YARD,BOW
page.content: {A.Sanders}has been established for 58 years.It is a block manufacturer and ready mix concrete yard.The business was started by the present owners, a husband and wife team, who run it with 14 staff. The yard is on a 12 acre site. They have 9 lorries,5 ready mix concete lorries, 4 fork lifts,3 Chasesides,2 pick ups, 2 block machines,2 garages,2 pits and 1 Ramp.To make concrete blocks they use 290lbs of cement plus small gravel and chippings.It is mixed for one and a half minutes. They can make 12000_17000 blocks a day.Approximately 12 lorries are loaded a day using a grab which holds 88 blocks.The lorries hold 300x6" or 500x4" blocks.They deliver in a 30 mile radius of Bow.
